question: Ritu made a birthday invitation in PowerPoint and added animations. What kind of software did she use?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Presentation Software

question: Arjun is confused between System Software and Application Software. What can help him identify the difference?
options: Application software helps users do specific tasks
explanation: The Correct Answer is Application software helps users do specific tasks

question: In a school computer lab, one student is typing text, another is doing calculations. Which software types are they likely using?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Typing: Word Processor, Calculations: Spreadsheet

question: A student clicks on a small picture of a printer on the screen. What part of the User Interface is this?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Icon

question: Ravi sees a long strip with many options at the top of MS Word. What is this part called?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Ribbon

question: Which of these helps the user interact with application software using pictures and buttons instead of typing commands?
explanation: The Correct Answer is GUI

question: A student sees two user interfaces. One is full of icons and buttons. The other has only a black screen with text. What is the second one called?
explanation: The Correct Answer is CLI

question: How can you insert comments in MS Word to provide feedback or additional information in a document?
options: Right-click on the text> Choose Add Comment
Use the Insert tab> Select Comment> Type comments
Press Ctrl + C> Add a comment
Access the View tab> Click on Comments
explanation: The Correct Answer is Right-click on the text> Choose Add Comment

question: When collaborating on a document, what is the purpose of the "Accept" option in the "Changes" group?
options: To apply suggested changes to the document
explanation: The Correct Answer is To apply suggested changes to the document

question: When using the "Compare" command, what does it allow you to identify between two versions of a document?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Differences in content

question: Where can you find the 'Spelling & Grammar' option in MS Word?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Review tab

question: MS Word helps the user to review the document for spelling and grammar.
explanation: The Correct Answer is TRUE

question: What is the main advantage of using Research Rabbit for academic research?
options: It provides a structured summary of relevant research
It translates research papers into multiple languages
It eliminates the need for peer reviews
explanation: The Correct Answer is It provides a structured summary of relevant research

question: Which AI-driven feature of Research Rabbit is being demonstrated here?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Graph Algorithm for research connections

question: Which of the following options is used to make an image appear bigger?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Zoom in

question: To send an object behind the text, what option will you click on?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Send Behind Text

question: Which of the following features will you use to color the borders of a bookmark?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Border Painter

question: Riya needs to find the “Insert Image” option in her application. She looks at the top menu bar but gets confused. What should she explore?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Ribbon Tabs and Toolbars

question: Aman is typing fast, and MS Word keeps changing “hte” to “the”. What feature is helping him?
explanation: The Correct Answer is AutoCorrect

question: Two students are working. One is editing images; the other is calculating exam marks. Who is using application software?
options: Neither – only system software is involved
explanation: The Correct Answer is Both are using application software

question: Rakesh saved his file as .doc but can't open it on his mobile. What might solve the problem?
options: Try opening in a Word-compatible app or use .pdf
Print the file and scan it
explanation: The Correct Answer is Try opening in a Word-compatible app or use .pdf

question: A student clicks “Print” but gets blank pages. What should she check first?
options: If her file is saved as .exe
explanation: The Correct Answer is Ink in the printer

question: Raj needs to calculate monthly electricity bills. What can help him automate calculations and totals?
explanation: The Correct Answer is MS Excel

question: Shruti opens a file and sees text, buttons, and pictures neatly arranged in boxes. What is she looking at?
explanation: The Correct Answer is GUI of Application Software

question: Tushar made a PowerPoint but forgot where he saved it. What is a good practice next time?
options: Always save in known folder and note the name
explanation: The Correct Answer is Always save in known folder and note the name

question: Meena is deciding between MS Excel and MS PowerPoint for her science project. She needs to explain findings with pictures and bullet points. Which one should she choose?
options: MS Excel – because it supports drawing
MS PowerPoint – because it allows slides with pictures and bullets
MS Word – because it has graphs
explanation: The Correct Answer is MS PowerPoint – because it allows slides with pictures and bullets

question: A file named “project.exe” is received by email. Shalini double-clicks it thinking it's a document. What risk is involved?
options: It might be a harmful program (executable file)
explanation: The Correct Answer is It might be a harmful program (executable file)

question: Zoom in & zoom Out option is present on the __________ corner of the screen.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Bottom Right

question: There are already defined zoom levels in a document but you can always customize the zoom level of the same.
explanation: The Correct Answer is TRUE

question: A feedback form is a document that includes __________.
explanation: The Correct Answer is potential questions

question: Amit types a letter and wants to highlight important lines in yellow. Which feature should he use?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Text Highlight Color

question: Two classmates use PowerPoint. One adds only text, the other uses images, sounds, transitions. Whose presentation will be more effective?
options: Images and transitions – because it’s more engaging
explanation: The Correct Answer is Images and transitions – because it’s more engaging

question: Teacher checks student files: one is .xls, one is .ppt. Which belongs to Excel and which to PowerPoint?
explanation: The Correct Answer is .xls = Excel, .ppt = PowerPoint

question: Arnav saves a document without “Save As” and can't find it later. What went wrong?
options: Saved in default or unknown folder
explanation: The Correct Answer is Saved in default or unknown folder

question: A menu bar shows options like ‘File’, ‘Insert’, ‘Design’. What are these collectively called in modern software?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Tabs on Ribbon

question: Sneha tries to find Spell Check in a toolbar but can't. Where else might she look for it?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Under Review or Tools tab

question: Two friends are editing text. One uses AutoCorrect, the other types manually. Which method is better and why?
options: AutoCorrect – saves time and fixes common errors
explanation: The Correct Answer is AutoCorrect – saves time and fixes common errors

question: A file was saved in .doc format but didn’t open on another device. What could have prevented this problem?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Saving as .pdf for compatibility

question: You want to email your Science project to the teacher. Which format is best and why?
explanation: The Correct Answer is .pdf – because it locks the format

question: Two girls saved presentations. One added titles, media; the other left defaults. Who prepared better?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Girl 1 – organized, creative, clear

question: For exploring certificate templates from Microsoft online, you have to enter the address _____________ in the address bar of your browser.
explanation: The Correct Answer is www.office.com

question: On www.office.com, once we click on the MS Word icon, which option should we click in order to explore some ready-made templates?
explanation: The Correct Answer is More templates

question: Which option should we click on, in order to edit a selected template online?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Open in browser

question: You need to insert a logo into a template you are editing in MS Word. The logo image is saved in your local device. After going to the Insert tab, which option should you select?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Picture > This Device

question: Which tab will you go to in order to save your file for the first time?
explanation: The Correct Answer is The File tab

question: A flyer template of Word contains rows and columns so that you can insert text and other elements properly. How will you adjust the row height or column width in Word?
options: By using the guidelines that are available in Word itself
By dragging on the size handles of the image
explanation: The Correct Answer is By using the guidelines that are available in Word itself

question: What is the function of the 'No Outline' option?
explanation: The Correct Answer is It removes the outline

question: Asana's AI validation mainly ensures _________.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Task completion

question: Ravi edits his letter in Word, wants to check spelling. Which tool?
options: Spell Check – to review all spellings
explanation: The Correct Answer is Spell Check – to review all spellings

question: Your friend saves classwork in .doc format, but you suggest using .pdf format. Why is .pdf format recommended?
options: .pdf opens in most devices without change
explanation: The Correct Answer is .pdf opens in most devices without change
